location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map Showing Selection by the Bahrein Petroleum Company Limited Under Concession Dated December 2nd 1925. Bahrein Island, Persian Gulf'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:130 x 315 mm, on sheet 190 x 333 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Reduced printed copy of an outline map of Bahrain produced by the Bahrein Petroleum Company, sent with a copy of the Mining Lease with a letter no. P.Z. 3850/35 dated 7 June 1935 (folio 169).Above title in the upper right-hand corner: ‘Second Schedule to the Lease dated 29th December 1934’.Contains inset outline map showing Muharrak Island and an extensive note with the ‘Description of Selection’.Shows the position of posts which are numbered with measurements and coordinates reported.Signed by the Sheikh of Bahrein (seal), F.A. Davis and J.M. Russell.Photographic copy of the map can be found at folio 164.Oriented with east to the top.
